welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tanashicho, Japan! Embrace the charm of our traditional Japanese architecture, serene gardens, and rich history. We invite you to explore our vibrant city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for official military flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haneda Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal at Haneda Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting the SSID 'HND Free Wi-Fi' and completing a short registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Atsugi NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights, primarily used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration to access.
